title: permabanned
body:
so ive only had one 14 day suspension and that was lowkey 4 months ago but now after a really bad game of going 6/18 with zed midlane and i got reported by my team for inting although i clearly wasnt just a bad game and i was actually trying to play with them shouting at me and being salty af i got banned and i also said a few mean things in chat to my team to defend myself although i should have just ignored them.

im wondering if its justified that i got a permaban after only 1 suspension and a bad game because this just does not seem fair.

oh and here is my chat log too.

Game 1
xAkG: WTF
xAkG: teleporting lil bitch
xAkG: kata is such a bullshit champ fuck that shit
xAkG: WHAT
xAkG: thats just stupid
xAkG: im not i cant play against fuckin katarina
xAkG: kys
xAkG: nice job there killis someone who is weak
xAkG: oh you can steal a kill but not help
xAkG: shut up 
xAkG: oh hey look a magical button called mute i wonder what it doe
xAkG: report jung and bot flame
xAkG: fucking riven man
xAkG: she stunned me
xAkG: so salty
xAkG: HOW OFTEN DO YOU HAVE THAT THING
xAkG: WTF
xAkG: thats just stupid man
xAkG: gg

i swear alot thats a bad habit but i dont really care about my account getting banned my main concern is all the money i put into rp and all the champions i bought, i kinda want em back besides leveling up a new acc sounds kinda fun. its like a trip down memory lane

replies.body:
> xAkG: kys

There you go.
if you mean that you have never said that in a match you are lying

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:27:15.521+0000)

> if you mean that you have never said that in a match you are lying

I can with great pleasure, say I never have and never will.

> I can with great pleasure, say I never have and never will.

wow sassy xD
The chat filter specifically searches for that when you get reported
so then bot who was also saying it to me should be permabanned too right ? same goes for jung

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:51:30.540+0000)
>
> so then bot who was also saying it to me should be permabanned too right ? same goes for jung

Yes, if u reported them then they should

PS: Never told anyone to commit suicide either.

fantastic its just that the thing is. i didnt report them i just wanted to get on with the next match and meet some friendly ppl who understand if u have a bad game ya feel me and with that acc permabanned about 500 euro just flew into heaven

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-08T20:36:03.592+0000)
>
> fantastic its just that the thing is. i didnt report them i just wanted to get on with the next match and meet some friendly ppl who understand if u have a bad game ya feel me and with that acc permabanned about 500 euro just flew into heaven

Do...you realize just how hypocritical this statement is right?
im friendly if my teammates are friendly, even if my teammate/mates are flaming me i ignore it but i cant really remember what it was that triggered me to say kys or get triggered in the first place.

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=00000000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-08T22:20:43.194+0000)
>
> im friendly if my teammates are friendly, even if my teammate/mates are flaming me i ignore it but i cant really remember what it was that triggered me to say kys or get triggered in the first place.

...

You can submit a support ticket to Riot in the event that you forget to report players until after you left the post game screen. Provide Riot with the identifying info and they will investigate.

But regardless of what ends up happening, you are responsible for your reaction to them. There is no good reason to tell somebody to end their life over a videogame.

It doesn't matter what they have said, or what they have done. They could be the biggest piece of shit in the world and they could totally deserve it, but that is still not justification for you to act in whatever way you want.

Mute and/or ignore them, and report them after the game. Riot will deal with them so you don't have to.
ugh. effort xD

You made the effort to post to complain about it here... it only takes a little bit more effort than that to submit a support ticket. They even give you the convenience of receiving and responding to any updates on your ticket by email.

And if you're referring to my last suggestion... It takes less effort to mute and report than it does to argue with a toxic teammate.

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-08T20:36:03.592+0000)
>
> fantastic its just that the thing is. i didnt report them i just wanted to get on with the next match and meet some friendly ppl who understand if u have a bad game ya feel me and with that acc permabanned about 500 euro just flew into heaven

No bad game can excuse telling someone to commit suicide.
no they wouldnt. EVEN if i would have reported them the bot would have checked their scores and deemed it okay (adc was like 10 to 4 or something) which would have counteracted the chat filter bot.

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=000000000001000000000001,timestamp=2017-11-08T22:36:17.396+0000)
>
> no they wouldnt. EVEN if i would have reported them the bot would have checked their scores and deemed it okay (adc was like 10 to 4 or something) which would have counteracted the chat filter bot.

Bot doesnt check scores when it comes to toxic behavior. Only chat.
huh k den xD
I think I said it once in Runescape in 2001.
topkek xD
I will also add to the previous guy, that I have never ever said that in a match. It's a dumb thing to say to someone you don't know.

I have never said it anywhere in any context in my life.

I do ask people to kill me at least every other week
You told them to kill themselves,  riot is super cereal about that kind of stuff
which kind of cereal. if its not kellogs i swear to god imma lose it

> [{quoted}](name=xAkG,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z2Ev7uT4,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-08T22:31:31.393+0000)
>
> which kind of cereal. if its not kellogs i swear to god imma lose it

Its... Its Walmart cereal...

>kys

"Why was I permabanned?"
I say it all the time. IN POST GAME LOBBY. If you're stupid enough to say it in game, you deserve to get banned.

also a kek thin was when i was looking at the report of the reason i was banned it said i was in the top 0.06% toxic ppl to get banned permanently and i have to say they need to check their statistics again lol. im NOT the next tyler1 or something that wasy lol
